title: Automated Changelog Updates
description: The changelog now updates itself. When frontend changes are made, Claude automatically generates documentation with screenshots and user-friendly descriptions.
benefit: Stay informed about every improvement without anyone having to remember to write it up. Changes are captured and documented the moment they happen.
howToUse: New entries appear automatically when features ship
Each entry includes screenshots showing what changed
Descriptions explain both what changed and why it matters

screenshots.caption: Entries are generated automatically with context from code changes
